gen:link.msg:message: `BalanceCashInflows` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementDaebHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_BalanceCashInflows')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementDaebHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_BalanceCashInflows return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementDaebHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfBalanceCashInflowsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementDaebHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfBalanceCashInflowsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementDaebHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfBalanceCashInflowsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementDaebHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfBalanceCashInflowsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
